page.title: 15RESTAURANTS
page.content: There are many restaurants in Cowes such as {Tonino's,Murray's,Ollies,G's,The {Copper Kettle,Spankers,Y Knots,Yorkies {and Capri. Most of these restaurants used to be public houses.Many restaurants are in the High street as they can be seen more easily by their customers. The busiest week of the year is Cowes Week.(The first week of August). In the summer extra staff are needed. Restaurants normally open at 12.00 noon and close at 2.00p.m. They open again at 7.00p.m. until early morning. The average cost of a meal is between Â£12 - Â£18 per head.
